questions.label: Has the member had an inpatient admission in the past 30 days?
Has the member had a re-admission within 30 days of a previous admission within the past year?
Has the member had two or more inpatient admissions within the past six months?
Has the member had two or more ER visits within the past six months?
Does the member have a high risk of inpatient admission or ER visits within the next six months?
Has the member had a significant decline in functional status or has an increased likelihood of needing long-term care within the next six months?
